title: DMR
info_head: A simple, reliable and efficient rifle designed by FN Herstal.
info_body:
It was born from the need for a mass-produced weapon provided to all deployed UAC marines. Requires very little weapon expertise to operate and withstands extreme temperatures, moisture and mud.
In its standard configuration it sports a holographic sight that integrates into your helmet for digital zooming and a 31-round magazine. Its modularity allows for upgrades such as replacement stocks, muzzle devices and custom recievers.
